snippet: Although riot police fired rubber bullets in at least one instance, the disturbances after the Kings' Stanley Cup win were far less serious than those that followed the Los Angeles Lakers' most recent N.B.A. titles, or the riot that engulfed downtown...
abstract: Although riot police fired rubber bullets in at least one instance, the disturbances after the Kings' Stanley Cup win were far less serious than those that followed the Los Angeles Lakers' most recent N.B.A. titles, or the riot that engulfed downtown Vancouver after last year's Cup finals.

headline.main: Disturbances Are Few in a City Prepared to Keep Title Celebration Calm
